Resources.Resource: Show editing tools on context menu
Show icons for read or unread

Configure the handling of read and unread marks for this list item type, if you want the item to be highlighted by a bold color, select 'Unread columns are highlighted' . Otherwise select 'Show icons for read or unread' other options may be available in Advanced Settings.
The installed license does not permit editing of these settings

Configure the highlighted color, the images used in iconic mode and enable a context menu item that allows the user to mark items read without reading them. If you only want to reset the read marks when a version is checked in, then select that option, otherwise marks will be reset whenever the item is updated
A SharePoint Timer Job to reinitialize this list has been queued

If the indicators for the list become disconected, you can validate them here, Re-initializing the list will reprocess all indicators for all users, Checking the list will reapply views and menu controls
Advanced configuration options for the read unread sub systems
Configure the minimum value for auto refresh intervals for a list, enter a 0 to disable this feature farm wide

Configure farm behaviour for the Balsamic Solutions RemarQ Site Column
Enter your license code or your email address for a trial license

Large SharePoint lists are lists are subject to query throtteling, if you want to support large lists then select the option that is best suited for your infrastructure. \"Default\" means to respect the SharePoint throttles. \"Elevate\" means that queries on large lists should ignore throttleing. \"Disable\" means that the list settings will be individually adjusted to disable throttleing when necessary
License applied, a schema update job has been started some of your lists will be inconsistant until the schema update job completes

All maintenance jobs have been re-initialized

The solution requires dbOwner access to a Sql database for storing the read indicators. If you want to use Integrated Security, then all SharePoint service accounts must have dbOwner permission to the solution database

Normally the RemarQ tracking system triggers read updates only when a user reads a SharePoint form. For document libraries this is the document properties information, some applications (e.g. Excel, Word, etc.) do not trigger the property page reads when they download the document. If you want a document marked as read when a user opens the document directly or downloads it, then you should enable tracking here.
If you have a central CDN for JQuery and Kendo update those paths here

Use LoginName formatting for Active Directory authenticated systems, use ClaimName for federated systems , use Secure Hash if you cannot have user names in the RemarQ databases. WARNING, if you change the name format you will lose any current read indicators
Configure RemarQ storage and runtime options and manage resource settings for this farm
A error occurred starting the daily maintenance job

Licensing for this feature is based on the number of front end web servers in your server farm. If your SharePoint configuration server has access to the internet you may update your license by providing your license code below and clicking "apply". If you dont have a license code and want to start a trial or use the free version , enter your email address and select a license type.Your trial license will be emailed to you. If your server is not connected to the internet you must download a license request file and email it to support@balsamicsolutions.com. You will receive a license file by email which you can activate by uploading the file and clicking the Redeem File button.

We hope you like our SharePoint solution. If you enjoy using it, you can purchase a license at our company web site http://www.remarq.info/, or email us at sales@balsamicsolutions.com .

Welcome to Balsamic Solutions SharePoint product enhancements. This SharePoint enhancement provides individual read/unread indicators for document libraries and SharePoint lists. We hope you enjoy using it. You can find detailed information on our web site at http://www.balsamicsolutions.com/ or at the product forum http://www.remarq.info .If you have any comments or questions you can email us at support@balsamicsolutions.com or post your questions on the forum.
